Description: Mass spectrometry-based approaches have become an essential cornerstone of research and drug discovery especially for novel modalities such as covalent drugs or targeted protein degradation therapeutics. The use of mass spectrometry spans all stages of therapeutics discovery from understanding fundamental biology and metabolism, to hit discovery, target deconvolution and profiling of advanced leads. In this session, we will discuss widely used chemo-proteomics approaches spanning a broad range of applications. Importantly, we will not only discuss the advances and powerful use cases but also some of the limitations and how these approaches fit into the larger picture of drug
SearchResultBody: ED03. Chemo-proteomics Approaches in Drug Discovery
Title: Chemo-proteomics Approaches in Drug Discovery
